name: minty-fresh-saas
title: Minty Fresh SaaS
desc: MintryFresh is a sleek and modern Astro SaaS theme designed for innovative tech companies and startups
article:
The theme features a clean and minimalistic design with a fresh mint color palette that evokes a sense of innovation and simplicity. The theme offers a smooth user experience with intuitive navigation, responsive layouts, and fast loading times.

It includes customizable components such as pricing tables, testimonials, feature showcases, and call-to-action sections, all designed to highlight the unique value of your SaaS product. With a focus on clarity and usability, MintryFresh is perfect for showcasing your software solutions and engaging potential customers.

Features

  • Optimized for high performance with a Google PageSpeed score of 97
  • Features over 12 pages
  • Allows content creation and updates in Markdown or MDX
  • OG image support included
  • Fully customizable (CSS, Menu Links, Socials, SEO meta tags)
  • Automatically imports MDX components
  • Includes contact form support (incl. a small form in the footer)
  • API & Feedback forms
  • Responsive design for desktops, tablets, and smartphones
  • Journal / News Articles
  • Built using the Tailwind CSS framework
  • SEO-friendly structure

Content / Pages

  • Landing Page (Home by clicking on logo)
  • Product (solutions, comparisons)
  • How it works
  • Sign Up & Sign In
  • Journal / News (+ individual articles)
  • Pricing (+ price comparison table)
  • Changelog
  • API Page (for Developers / includes Swagger-like form with code snippets)
  • About (Benefits, Values & Timeline/Journey components)
  • Career (+ open role / job positions)
  • FAQ Page
  • Contact Sales (contact form)
